text: Brignoli is an Italian surname. Notable people with the surname include: *Alberto Brignoli (born 1991), Italian footballer *Ermanno Brignoli (born 1969), Italian cyclist *Luca Brignoli (born 1983), Italian footballer *Paolo Brignoli (1942–1986), Italian entomologist *Pasquale Brignoli (1824–1884), Italian-born American opera singer Category:Italian-language surnames
title: Brignoli
